languages.text: "Подобное расточительство сакрального инфотока Движущей Силы неприемлемо. Настаиваю на прерывании цикла данной единицы без права на искупление личной неэффективности".

traits.locale_text: [draft] "Подобное расточительство сакрального инфотока Движущей Силы неприемлемо. Настаиваю на прерывании цикла данной единицы без права на искупление личной неэффективности".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Such a waste of the sacred current of the Motive Force is unacceptable. I demand the immediate cessation of this unit's vital processes without the right to atone for its personal inefficiency."
languages.original_text: "Подобное расточительство сакрального инфотока Движущей Силы неприемлемо. Настаиваю на прерывании цикла данной единицы без права на искупление личной неэффективности".

"Such a waste of the sacred current of the Motive Force is unacceptable. I demand the immediate cessation of this unit's vital processes without the right to atone for its personal inefficiency."
"Such a waste of the sacred current of the Motive Force is unacceptable. I demand the immediate cessation of this unit's vital processes without the right to atone for its personal inefficiency."

languages.text: "Eine derartige Verschwendung der heiligen Strömung der Antriebskraft ist inakzeptabel. Ich verlange die sofortige Beendigung der Lebensprozesse dieser Einheit – ohne das Recht, ihre persönliche Ineffizienz wiedergutzumachen."
languages.original_text: "Such a waste of the sacred current of the Motive Force is unacceptable. I demand the immediate cessation of this unit's vital processes without the right to atone for its personal inefficiency."

traits.locale_text: "Eine derartige Verschwendung der heiligen Strömung der Antriebskraft ist inakzeptabel. Ich verlange die sofortige Beendigung der Lebensprozesse dieser Einheit – ohne das Recht, ihre persönliche Ineffizienz wiedergutzumachen."

languages.text: « Un tel gâchis du courant sacré de la Force Motrice est inacceptable. J'exige une cessation immédiate des processus vitaux de cette unité, et ce, sans possibilité d'expier son inefficacité personnelle. »
languages.original_text: "Such a waste of the sacred current of the Motive Force is unacceptable. I demand the immediate cessation of this unit's vital processes without the right to atone for its personal inefficiency."

traits.locale_text: « Un tel gâchis du courant sacré de la Force Motrice est inacceptable. J'exige une cessation immédiate des processus vitaux de cette unité, et ce, sans possibilité d'expier son inefficacité personnelle. »

languages.text: “如此浪费神圣源力的行为实在是令人无法接受。我要求立刻停止此单位的核心程序，此单位无权为个人效率低下的恶行赎罪。”
languages.original_text: "Such a waste of the sacred current of the Motive Force is unacceptable. I demand the immediate cessation of this unit's vital processes without the right to atone for its personal inefficiency."

traits.locale_text: “如此浪费神圣源力的行为实在是令人无法接受。我要求立刻停止此单位的核心程序，此单位无权为个人效率低下的恶行赎罪。”

languages.text: «Desperdiciar de esta forma la sagrada corriente de la Fuerza Motriz es inaceptable. Exijo el cese inmediato de los procesos vitales de esta unidad, sin derecho a expiar su ineficiencia personal».
languages.original_text: "Such a waste of the sacred current of the Motive Force is unacceptable. I demand the immediate cessation of this unit's vital processes without the right to atone for its personal inefficiency."

traits.locale_text: «Desperdiciar de esta forma la sagrada corriente de la Fuerza Motriz es inaceptable. Exijo el cese inmediato de los procesos vitales de esta unidad, sin derecho a expiar su ineficiencia personal».

languages.text: 「聖なる動力の流れを無駄にするなど許されることではありません。このユニットの重要なプロセスを即刻停止し、その個人的な非効率性を償う権利を与えないことを要求します」
languages.original_text: "Such a waste of the sacred current of the Motive Force is unacceptable. I demand the immediate cessation of this unit's vital processes without the right to atone for its personal inefficiency."

traits.locale_text: 「聖なる動力の流れを無駄にするなど許されることではありません。このユニットの重要なプロセスを即刻停止し、その個人的な非効率性を償う権利を与えないことを要求します」

languages.text: "Devinim Gücü'nün kutsal akımının böyle israf edilmesi kabul edilemez. Bu birimin, kişisel verimsizliğini telafi etme hakkı olmaksızın hayati süreçlerinin derhâl durdurulmasını talep ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "Such a waste of the sacred current of the Motive Force is unacceptable. I demand the immediate cessation of this unit's vital processes without the right to atone for its personal inefficiency."

traits.locale_text: "Devinim Gücü'nün kutsal akımının böyle israf edilmesi kabul edilemez. Bu birimin, kişisel verimsizliğini telafi etme hakkı olmaksızın hayati süreçlerinin derhâl durdurulmasını talep ediyorum."
